content: this doily has 12 rounds the finished size is about 11 in diameter **materials needed** * size 3 crochet thread 60-70 yards * 3 25 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **gauge** * rounds 1-3 measure about 1 1/2 **special stitches** * cluster * 2-double_crochet decrease * 3-double_crochet decrease * single_crochet decrease * picot * triple picot
